inclusion.criterion: Patient with advanced cancer (local recurrence or metastatic) at the time of their follow up visit to the outpatient palliative care clinic
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient designates a family member who is a patient's parent, spouse, adult child, sibling, other relative, or significant other (any other person defined by the patient as a partner) to answer the family questionnaire.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with normal cognitive status as determined by the interviewer and by her/his ability to understand the nature of the study and consent process.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient willing to participate in the study and sign informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Family member is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Family member with normal cognitive status as determined by the interviewer and by her/his ability to understand the nature of the study and consent process.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Family member willing to participate in the study and sign informed consent.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: All participants in the international centers must be from Argentinian, Chilean, or Guatemalan descendence respectively.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All participants in the U.S. must be from self-reported Hispanic descendence, first or second generation immigrants, and reside in the U.S. for at least 5 years.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member can not complete the assessments independently.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Either patient or family member refuses to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and is currently under treatment. She is working as an editor and smokes 10 cigarettes per day.
